text: Grue or grues can be ==Places== * Grue, Norway, a municipality in Innlandet county * Isle-aux-Grues, an island in Quebec, Canada * Grues, Vend√©e, a commune in France * Grue (river), a river in north-west Italy ==In fiction== * Grue (monster), a fictional predatory creature invented by American author Jack Vance and featured in the Zork series of interactive fiction computer games ==Other== * Crane (bird), a bird from the Grue family
title: Grue
